titles.title-2: I also love languages, hiking, history & traveling

about.about-1: Hello, my name is Jasmine Zeng. I'm a software engineer and marketing undergrad based in Hong Kong. With a restless curiosity and an independent mind, I believe that anything is possible with action, consistency, and perseverance. Therefore, I never confine myself to a set role and always stay open to new ideas and challenges.
about.about-2: My journey in software engineering started with the goal of creating a hiking blog. As a result of my frustration with website builders, I committed myself to an immersive coding bootcamp to build the blog from scratch. Unexpectedly, my passion for it was ignited to the point that I wanted to make it my career. Having an emphasis on personal development, continuous learning, and a resilient mind, I believe that software engineering is the perfect fit for me.
about.about-3: Among my other passions, I enjoy learning languages and hiking the most. Language acts like a bridge which connects me to people and their cultures deeply. I am a fluent speaker of Mandarin, English and Cantonese and I acquired German and French to a conversational level during quarantine. As an avid hiker who enjoys sharing their experiences, my photograph was featured in local news after winning silver prize in a contest where hikers were invited to create a trail map for the community.
about.about-4: I’m currently seeking a full-time software engineer position. If you hire me, you’ll have a team player with strong problem-solving skills, a resilient spirit, and an open mindset. More about my skills and experiences can be found on my résumé.
